tasks.help: The <c>xcrun altool</c> is used to upload your IPA

properties.name: ApiKey
properties.help: Specifies the API Key generated from the Apple Auth Key

properties.name: IssuerId
properties.help: The Issuer Id from App Store Connect

properties.name: UploadPackage
properties.help: Uploads the package at the specified path.

properties.name: AppleId
properties.help: Specifies the AppleID of the app package.

properties.name: BundleVersion
properties.help: Specifies the bundle version of the app package.

properties.name: BundleShortVersion
properties.help: Specifies the bundle short version string of the app package.

properties.name: AscProvider
properties.help: Required with --notarize-app and --notarization-history when a user account is associated with multiple providers and using username/password authentication. You can use the --list-providers command to retrieve the providers associated with your account. You may instead use --team-id or --asc-public-id.
